messages.subject: LOAN OFFER (Contact jserg_loanagency@hotmail.com)
messages.body:
-- Dear Sir/Madam,

We Offer Private, Commercial and Personal Loans with very Minimal annual Interest Rates as Low as 3% within 1 year to 50 years repayment duration period toany part of the world. We give out loans within the range of $5,000 to $100,000,000 USD. Our loans are well insured for maximum security is our priority.

Interested Persons should contact me via E-mail

Lender'sName:John Sergio
Lender's Email: jserg_loanagency@hotmail.com

BORROWERS INFORMATION

Names:
Country:
Address:
Age:
Fax Number:
Personal Number:
Occupation:

Monthly Income:
Amount Needed:
Loan duration:
Brief description of individual:

Best Regards
John Sergio
messages.raw:
John Sergio
From: "JOHN SERGIO LENDERS" <jacato@centurytel.net>
To: undisclosed-recipients:;
Subject: LOAN OFFER (Contact jserg_loanagency@hotmail.com)


-- Dear Sir/Madam,

We Offer Private, Commercial and Personal Loans with very Minimal annual Interest Rates as Low as 3% within 1 year to 50 years repayment duration period toany part of the world. We give out loans within the range of $5,000 to $100,000,000 USD. Our loans are well insured for maximum security is our priority.

Interested Persons should contact me via E-mail

Lender'sName:John Sergio
Lender's Email: jserg_loanagency@hotmail.com

BORROWERS INFORMATION

Names:
Country:
Address:
Age:
Fax Number:
Personal Number:
Occupation:
Sex:
Monthly Income:
Amount Needed:
Loan duration:
Brief description of individual:

Best Regards
John Sergio
[The scam is this: there is no money to be lent out. The only real money is the "insurance fee" that the borrower must pay. The form that needs filling out is just, uh, filler. Like props on a stage. Actual lenders - unless they're gangsters - have offices where you go to apply, and credit is tightening these days, not falling into your lap through at-large e-mails. There are of course the check-cashing store on the corner, and cash advances on a credit card - but don't even start down that road. And now back to our regularly scheduled scambait.]

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Sergio,
I received your email a while ago - are you offering loans? Our gym needs a new squat rack and some kettlebells and, well, things aer quiet and we need some funding to get this equipment.
Hope you can help- I am a bit naive about matters like this so I'm happy to be in your professional hands.
Yours in strength,
Jack Bigstakk - Personal Trainer

messages.subject: LOAN AGREEMENT/CONDITIONS AND REPAYMENT SCHEDULE.
messages.body:
JOHN SERGIO LOAN AGENCYRef: EAASL/941OYI/02/SHYN
Batch: 12/25/0034
 
 
  Attention: Jack Bigstakk,
 
  I wish to acknowlegde the receipt of your email. i have reviewed the
information you sent to acquire a loan of $50,000.00 and i have prepared a loan
repayment schedule / Loan agreement to that effect. 
 
 
REPAYMENT SCHEDULE

Loan Balance:  $50,000..00  
Adjusted Loan Balance:  $50,000.00  
Loan Interest Rate:  3.00% 
Loan Fees:  0.00% 
Loan Term:  5 years 
Minimum Payment:  $0.00  
 
Monthly Loan Payment: $898.43  
Number of Payments:  60 
 
Cumulative Payments:  $53,906.09  
Total Interest Paid:  $3,906.09  Note: The monthly loan payment was calculated
at 59 payments of $898.43 plus a final payment of $898.72..

LOAN AGREEMENT/CONDITIONS:
 
The applicant will start the repayment of loan at the end of every month
starting from 1st month after loan has been transferred. 
 Failure to pay back the loan at this expected date/period, legal actions
will be taken against the applicant by our attorney immediately. 
 Applicant who is unable to meet with the repayment will be given 6 months
more as a grace period before legal actions will be taken. 
 Insurance process shall be carried out on the loan. Expenses is on both
parties (Lender and Borrower).

    Be informed that you will be expected to send to me a scanned copy of your
ID/international passport to hold against the loan, since you are an
international applicant. Once this is received, insurance process will
commence. At the end of this process, approval of the loan will not be a
problem..
 
The loan will be transfered into your personal bank account,which you will
provide to me later.Once the loan has been approved ready for transfer then i
will instruct you to provide to me your Banking Informations to enable the bank
make a swift transfer to you.
 
Do get back to me as soon as possible if you are in agreement with the terms
and condition, for the loan process to continue. 
 
                                                      
 
                                                                                                                                       
Yours Sincerely,
Mr. John Sergio.
messages.raw:
John Sergio
From: JOHN SERGIO LOAN AGENCY <jserg_loanagency@hotmail.com>
Sent: Friday, 8 August, 2008 7:45:36 PM
Subject: LOAN AGREEMENT/CONDITIONS AND REPAYMENT SCHEDULE.

JOHN SERGIO LOAN AGENCYRef: EAASL/941OYI/02/SHYN
Batch: 12/25/0034

Attention: Jack Bigstakk,

I wish to acknowlegde the receipt of your email. i have reviewed the information you sent to acquire a loan of $50,000.00 and i have prepared a loan repayment schedule / Loan agreement to that effect.

REPAYMENT SCHEDULE

Loan Balance: $50,000..00
Adjusted Loan Balance: $50,000.00
Loan Interest Rate: 3.00%
Loan Fees: 0.00%
Loan Term: 5 years
Minimum Payment: $0.00

Monthly Loan Payment: $898.43
Number of Payments: 60

Cumulative Payments: $53,906.09
Total Interest Paid: $3,906.09 Note: The monthly loan payment was calculated at 59 payments of $898.43 plus a final payment of $898.72..

LOAN AGREEMENT/CONDITIONS:

{1}The applicant will start the repayment of loan at the end of every month starting from 1st month after loan has been transferred.
{2} Failure to pay back the loan at this expected date/period, legal actions will be taken against the applicant by our attorney immediately.
{3} Applicant who is unable to meet with the repayment will be given 6 months more as a grace period before legal actions will be taken.
{4} Insurance process shall be carried out on the loan. Expenses is on both parties (Lender and Borrower).

Be informed that you will be expected to send to me a scanned copy of your ID/international passport to hold against the loan, since you are an international applicant. Once this is received, insurance process will commence. At the end of this process, approval of the loan will not be a problem..

The loan will be transfered into your personal bank account,which you will provide to me later.Once the loan has been approved ready for transfer then i will instruct you to provide to me your Banking Informations to enable the bank make a swift transfer to you.

Do get back to me as soon as possible if you are in agreement with the terms and condition, for the loan process to continue.

Yours Sincerely,
Mr. John Sergio.

messages.body:
Hey Mr. Sergio!
Thanks for the schedule. It seems cool to me, only 3% interest!!
 
Hey, do you want payment in dollars, Smegaroon Golden Dorks, pounds sterling,
or would you prefer a nice Vietnamese dong?
 
Can't wait to get the money. I've already chosen the kettlebells and squat rack
- and there's enough left in the budget to get a new pull-up machine AND to
re-decorate the spinning studio! Isn't that great?!
 
You do seem a little serious though, this is all such great news I would have
thought you'd be really happy too! Do you work out? How much can you bench?
 
Yours in strength,
 
Jack Bigstakk - Personal Trainer
messages.raw:
Jack Bigstakk

Hey, do you want payment in dollars, Smegaroon Golden Dorks, pounds sterling, or would you prefer a nice Vietnamese dong?

Can't wait to get the money. I've already chosen the kettlebells and squat rack - and there's enough left in the budget to get a new pull-up machine AND to re-decorate the spinning studio! Isn't that great?!

You do seem a little serious though, this is all such great news I would have thought you'd be really happy too! Do you work out? How much can you bench?

Yours in strength,
Jack Bigstakk - Personal Trainer

messages.subject: LOAN INSURANCE UPDATE
messages.body:
JOHN SERGIO LOAN AGENCY
Ref: EAASL/941OYI/02/SHYN
Batch: 12/25/0034
  
Attention: Mr. Jack Bigstakk,
 
      Top of the day to you. I wish to acknowlegde the reciept of your mail
stating that you are in acknowledgement with the terms and condition of
releasing the loan to you. The insurance fee for the loan amount is $1000
USD(One Thousand USD Only), which we both have to pay 50% each. That means you
are required to pay $500 USD (Five Hundred USD Only) as insurance fee for the
loan. The loan has to be insured before we can proceed with the transfer of the
loan to you. You are to send to us a scanned copy of your international ID/
driver's license* via e-mail that we can hold against your loan.
 
  I will advise that you go ahead and make the payment to the insurance
company, so as to enable them insure the loan in your name and favour before it
will be transfered into your bank account which you are to provide to us. 

 Once the loan has been insured,a legal attorney will get some vital document
ready and then have the loan approved, after which it will be ready for
transfer to your bank account.  It normally takes 2 working days to get the
loan approved after the loan might have been insured. 
 
After the loan amount has been insured in your name, i will immediately send to
you the LOAN INSURANCE CERTIFICATE,which you will also keep to yourself for
reference purposes.
messages.raw:
John Sergio
From: JOHN SERGIO LOAN AGENCY <jserg_loanagency@hotmail.com>
Sent: Monday, 11 August, 2008 4:23:31 PM
Subject: LOAN INSURANCE UPDATE

JOHN SERGIO LOAN AGENCY
Ref: EAASL/941OYI/02/SHYN
Batch: 12/25/0034

Attention: Mr. Jack Bigstakk,

Top of the day to you. I wish to acknowlegde the reciept of your mail stating that you are in acknowledgement with the terms and condition of releasing the loan to you. The insurance fee for the loan amount is $1000 USD(One Thousand USD Only), which we both have to pay 50% each. That means you are required to pay $500 USD (Five Hundred USD Only) as insurance fee for the loan. The loan has to be insured before we can proceed with the transfer of the loan to you. You are to send to us a scanned copy of your international ID/ driver's license* via e-mail that we can hold against your loan.

I will advise that you go ahead and make the payment to the insurance company, so as to enable them insure the loan in your name and favour before it will be transfered into your bank account which you are to provide to us.

Once the loan has been insured,a legal attorney will get some vital document ready and then have the loan approved, after which it will be ready for transfer to your bank account. It normally takes 2 working days to get the loan approved after the loan might have been insured.

After the loan amount has been insured in your name, i will immediately send to you the LOAN INSURANCE CERTIFICATE,which you will also keep to yourself for reference purposes.

[* - never send a scammer your identification. Not the real one, anyway. Oh yeah and the 'vital document' will involve 'legal fees'.]

messages.body:
Hey, Mr Sergio!
How are you? Man, I had an amazing spin class today. They sure burnt some
calories!! Do you exercise at all? You're welcome here at the Muscle Up /
Grunting Unlimited Gym any time! 

Listen, this all sounds great but it's moving a little bit quickly! I had a bit
of a chat with someone my Auntie Agatha works with, okay, and I have a couple
of questions:
Can we not add the cost of insurance onto the loan? Have I even been approved
for it? And what is the APR of this loan?
I'm a bit confused, Mr. Sergio - I'm a PT, not a money guy, and I just want a
new squat rack and some more kettlebells!  
Would you mind having a word with my Auntie Agatha's colleague just to clear
these issues up? I'd really appreciate it, then we can pay the insurance.
He's a Russian guy, a bit older than me. He can be a bit, well, offhand, but he
doesn't mean to be (at least I don't think so, ha ha!!) but you know where you
are with him.
Finally, may I send an image of my passport instead of an ID card? I don't have
one of those!!
Thanks Mr Sergio!!!
Yours in strength,
Jack Bigstakk - Personal Trainer
messages.raw:
Jack Bigstakk

Listen, this all sounds great but it's moving a little bit quickly! I had a bit of a chat with someone my Auntie Agatha works with, okay, and I have a couple of questions:
Can we not add the cost of insurance onto the loan? Have I even been approved for it? And what is the APR of this loan?
I'm a bit confused, Mr. Sergio - I'm a PT, not a money guy, and I just want a new squat rack and some more kettlebells!
Would you mind having a word with my Auntie Agatha's colleague just to clear these issues up? I'd really appreciate it, then we can pay the insurance. He's a Russian guy, a bit older than me. He can be a bit, well, offhand, but he doesn't mean to be (at least I don't think so, ha ha!!) but you know where you are with him.
Finally, may I send an image of my passport instead of an ID card? I don't have one of those!!
Thanks Mr Sergio!!!
Yours in strength,
Jack Bigstakk - Personal Trainer

messages.body:
Yo Mr Sergio!!
How are you? 
Listen. About this $500. I don't know anything about this kind of thing but if
I could afford $500, I wouldn't need a loan!!
And who are London Scottish Bank? I have never heard of them but I trust you.
Do you think we should contact my financial adviser? I'm terribly confused.
Do you still need my passport?
And you didn't answer my question. I don't mean to be nosey, I'm just
interested - do you do any exercise? I'm training tomorrow actually - can't
wait!!
Yours in strength,

Jack Bigstakk - Personal Trainer

messages.subject: YOUR URGENT RESPONSE NEEDED
messages.body:
Attn: Mr. Jack Bigstakk,
 
I got your mail but I want you to know that the said insurance fee ($500.00)
cannot be included in the loan funds because we are also part of the insurance
process. Besides that, you are not making the payment to us but to the
Insurance Company. 
 
I hereby advice you to act fast and get back to us so as to give you the
payment instruction of insurance fee as soon as possible.
 
Note: The loan funds has been approved by our attorney but our payment bank
(London Scottish Bank Plc) will not commence the transfer of the loan funds to
you without insuring it.
 
We await your prompt response in this regards, okay.
 
John Sergio.
messages.raw:
John Sergio
From: JOHN SERGIO LOAN AGENCY <jserg_loanagency@hotmail.com>
Sent: Friday, 15 August, 2008 6:23:13 PM
Subject: YOUR URGENT RESPONSE NEEDED

Attn: Mr. Jack Bigstakk,

I got your mail but I want you to know that the said insurance fee ($500.00) cannot be included in the loan funds because we are also part of the insurance process. Besides that, you are not making the payment to us but to the Insurance Company.

I hereby advice you to act fast and get back to us so as to give you the payment instruction of insurance fee as soon as possible.

Note: The loan funds has been approved by our attorney but our payment bank (London Scottish Bank Plc) will not commence the transfer of the loan funds to you without insuring it.

We await your prompt response in this regards, okay.

John Sergio.

Hey Mr Sergio!!
 
Great to hear from you man, what's news?
 
Listen, I'm copying in my financial adviser, Mr Stroganov, See, I will pay this $500 but I don't have it at the moment. I was thinking of a way for us to work this out?
 
I think together we can get this modality moving.
 
I gotta train and get some protein shakes.
 
Talk to you soon!!
 
Yours in strength
 
Jack Bigstakk - - Personal Trainer

YOUR AUNT AGATHA HAS ORDERED ME TO ENSURE THAT YOU DO NOT FIND YOURSELF IN TROUBLE WITH THESE PEOPLE AND I HAVE TO TELL YOU THAT THERE MANY OTHER THINGS FOR MYSELF AND MY STAFF TO DO THAN BABYSIT HER LADYSHIP'S DAFT NEPHEW_YOU ARE AWARE I HOPE THAT MR SERGIO IS A 419 CRIMINAL??_THE YOUTH OF TODAY I ASK YOU_IN RUSSIA YOU WOULD HAVE BEEN PUT ON GUARD DUTY IN THE MIDDLE OF WINTER FOR SUCH NAIEVETY I CAN ASSURE YOU OF THAT_

- S

Stroganov Publishing (Pvt) Ltd
4402 Bowdinskaya Street
Moscow 0169
Russia

How are you doing? If you don't mind me saying, you're not the friendliest. I am about to place a large amount of business with you but you have no interest in making things easy.
 
I asked if you liked to exercise - I am a personal trainer so I LOVE it!!
 
As for the 500 bucks, well, let's just say it's in hand. When do you need it?
Yours in strength,
 
Jack Bigstakk - Personal Trainer

messages.body:
Aug. 23

Yo Mr. Sergio!
 
How are you? I'm REALLY tired today. Spin classes do that. I did weights before though. I isolated my anterior deltoids, then supersetted my biceps and triceps. No kettlebells where I was though. I find that dumbbells are okay but there's no fluidity that I get with kettlebells.
 
Still. Now, about this $500. No problem. Western Union okay? There's an office here on Smegaroon Island I can use.
 
Yours in strength
 
Jack Bigstakk - Personal Trainer

messages.body:
Attn: Mr. Jack Bigstakk,

We got your mail and I want you to know that you are the one delaying the transfer of the loan funds to you because we have arrange all vital documents needed for the transfer of the funds to you by our payment bank (London Scottish Bank, Plc). We have been waiting for you to make your payment of the insurance fee but you never bother to send it, so we thought maybe you've lost interest in the loan offer. But now i see you still have interest, act as instructed okay.

All you need do now is to go ahead and make the payment for the insurance ($500.00) so that we can commence the transfer of the loan funds to you. Act fast in this regards so that we can get done with this loan process as soon as possible.

Hope to hearing from soonest in regards the payment information of the insurance fee.

John Sergio.

But now i see you still have interest, act as instructed okay.

John Sergio.

messages.body:
Yo Yo Sergio!
 
Great to hear from you my man!
 
Look. I don't have a problem with this $500. In fact I'm looking at it right now after selling my old weights bench.
 
I looked at the London Scottish Bank website and it all seems okay.
 
So what happens now? How do I pay this fee? I think you mentioned Western Union but there isn't one here.
 
Yours in strength,
 
Jack Bigstakk - - Personal Trainer
